def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_large_black = is_large(x, ctx) and is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_smaller_x = is_smaller(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_very_light_gray = is_light(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_above_x = is_above(y, x, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_large_black
            and check_y_smaller_x
            and check_y_very_light_gray
            and check_y_above_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
state = turn(state)
